actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Gas Act to extend its application to the direct sale of natural gas in interstate commerce, and to provide that provisions of the act shall not apply to certain sales in interstate commerce.

summary.text: Natural Gas Supply Act - Extends the application of the Natural Gas Act to the direct sale of natural gas in interstate commerce. Provides that provisions of such Act shall not apply to specified sales in interstate commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Gas Act to extend its application to the direct sale of natural gas in interstate commerce, and to provide that provisions of the act shall not apply to certain sales in interstate commerce.
